page.title: 05St.Andrew's Church
page.content: St.Andrew's Church,Barnt Green was built in 1909 as a Missionary church between the Parishes of Alvechurch and Lickey.For this reason it was given the name of St.Andrew,the first missionary.It was never finished as a building.The money saved by not building a tower and a complete frontage helped to finance the building of the village school,also called St.Andrew's School.The first vicar was Rev. Percy Jones. {Religion}plays an important part in the lives of many people in the village.Each Sunday 150 people attend the{service}during which children leave and go to{Sunday {School.}In an effort to bring the congregation closer together the rood screen was moved into a new position.This helps in the aim of the Church to feel part of God's family.
